text: Is it possible to remove deleted files with `hs upload` the way you can with `hs watch` with the `--remove` flag? If not, is there a best practice for how to `hs upload` in a production workflow such that you remove files that have been deleted?

You should be able to run a `hs watch --initial-upload --remove`  and then just stop the watch right away. That will re-upload whatever youre choosing to watch and remove anything not in your local system. Just make sure you stop watching :stuck_out_tongue:
